Articles.Content: Hello, first post in a while. Want to get to know you all. Recently with KSP .14.1 I have landed on the moon with Bill, Bob, and Jeb. I quit for a while (thank God I can save in mid flight) and haven\'t returned to the Kerbin yet. Love this game, it\'s what I have been waiting for, for a long time. See yah from Mars.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Mincespy

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hello!

Indeed 2 brothers from Brazil working for a small company in Mexico achieve awesomeness!

Thor
